full_summary:
Microsoft Surface Laptop SE or Equivalent Notebooks for Department of National Defence
=====================================

**Notice of Proposed Procurement**
--------------------------------

Solicitation No.: BPM018922/23791
Department: Shared Services Canada
Notification Period: 14 to 27 September 2023

**Description of Requirement**
-----------------------------

The Department of National Defence is seeking a contract to supply 500 Microsoft Surface Laptop SE or equivalent notebooks. This procurement is for educational and training purposes to support cadets. The delivery destination will be various locations, and the delivery date is expected to be within 60 working days from contract award.

**Delivery and Security Requirements**
--------------------------------------

There are no comprehensive security requirements or land claim agreements associated with this procurement.

**Procurement Method**
----------------------

This procurement will be conducted through a competitive open bidding process.

**Notice Requirements**
----------------------

All potential bidders must submit a responsive bid to be considered for award. A comprehensive evaluation will be conducted, and the bidder with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for contract award.

**Bid Submission Requirements**
------------------------------

To access the solicitation and submit a bid, please visit the Shared Services Canada website at [supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca](http://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca). All documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Contact Information**
----------------------

For any questions regarding this solicitation, please contact:

Sorn Prak
Procurement Officer
Shared Services Canada
400 Cooper St, 6th Floor
Ottawa, ON K2P 2H8
Phone: (613) 298-2073
Email: [Sorn.prak@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:Sorn.prak@ssc-spc.gc.ca)



**Legal Notice**
------------------

The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement and reserves the right to accept or reject any or all submissions in response to this solicitation. No warranty, express or implied, is given or accepted.
 *Note: Please be aware that the rewritten entry is more professional and concise, excluding any unnecessary information. The focus is on the key details of the procurement, including the procurement method, notice requirements, bid submission requirements, and contact information. The rewritten entry should not exceed 400 words.* 
Lastly, Please conducted a Quality Assurance check on this entry to ensure that all relevant points are included and the grammar and spelling are correct. Thank you.
